string.value: Arec says that he will officially recognize the Dual Blades if you can pass his test. Hunt the #bWhite Fangs#k, the legendary white hunters, and bring back their drops.

Arec said that he would officially recognize the Dual Blades if you passed his test. His test was to hunt the #bWhite Fangs#k, the legendary white hunters, and bring back their drops. You passed Arec's test by hunting #b300#k White Fangs and bringing back #b100 White Fang Tails#k.
If you pass my test, I will officially recognize you and the Dual Blades. Receiving my recognition will help you launch the new future as you so desire. Will you accept my test?

The #bWhite Fangs#k that roam the snowy fields of El Nath are known as the white hunters. They are called hunters because of their violent nature and often prey upon the residents of El Nath. As your test, I want you to eliminate #b300 White Fangs#k and bring back #b100 White Fang Tails#k as your proof.
If you refuse my test, I will not officially recognize you. You will regret denying this rare opportunity.

Well, you have done it. Syl is lucky to have people like you. I have no choice but to recognize you and the Dual Blades on behalf of your effort and determination. Just don't let this get to your pride...

The #bWhite Fangs#k that roam the snowy fields of El Nath are known as the white hunters. They are called hunters because of their violent nature as they often prey upon the residents of El Nath. As your test, I want you to eliminate #b300 White Fangs#k and bring back #b100 White Fang Tails#k as your proof.
